ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] roasted walrus with plum sauce
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t have Tboots, I have Jboots, but for my purposes they re comparable, and I find them quite useful. I use them to enter areas where Selo s isn t good
ygData.messageBody:
I don't have Tboots, I have Jboots, but for my purposes they're comparable, and I find them quite useful.
I use them to enter areas where Selo's isn't good (dungeons, for example), as well as to DOT kite. It
makes kiting a lot faster - you don't have to twist in Selo's. Plus, if you aren't in a real hurry to get
somewhere (because the rest of your group is coming from other places and will be awhile), you can sing
other stuff instead and still run fast enough to stay out of danger, for the most part.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 59.68 songs, Innoruuk (and I thought level 54 was a pain...)



Vic Matos wrote:

> Travelers Boots are Lore no drop too but then again we as bards wouldnt
